caseTitle: Pakistan Olympic Assocation thr. its President v. Nadeem Aftab Sindhu & others
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE MIAN SAQIB NISAR, HCJ
tagline: Pakistan Olympic Association is not a person exercising functions in connection with the affairs of the Federation in terms of Article 199(1)(a)(i) and (ii) of the Constitution. No writ of quo warranto could therefore lie against its office holders nor could a writ lie against the Association in terms of Article 199(1)(a) of the Constitution.
